generated_body: The article titled "Clown nose placed on controversial Trump billboard in downtown Phoenix" is likely to discuss the recent installation of a clown nose on a billboard featuring former President Donald Trump. Readers may expect an exploration of the motivations behind this act, including public reactions and any relevant political commentary. The piece could provide context about the billboard's original message and its significance in local political discourse, while also possibly including statements from those involved in the installation or from critics of the billboard's content.
